statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_records
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_records
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 100
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM transaction_records GROUP BY transaction_type
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_transactions FROM transaction_records GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_transactions > 1
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit' OR transaction_type = 'Debit' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_records GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM transaction_records;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transaction_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, password FROM user_data ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_records GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT user_data.username, transaction_records.amount FROM user_data JOIN transaction_records ON user_data.user_id = transaction_records.user_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_records WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM backup_history WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_data WHERE user_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_data WHERE username IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_data WHERE user_id=1001;
SELECT transaction_amount FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_id IN (100, 101, 102);
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 100
SELECT username, email FROM user_data ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC
SELECT user_id, username, email, password_hash FROM user_data
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, permission FROM user_permissions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT backup_size, backup_timestamp FROM backup_history WHERE backup_size > 1000;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(transaction_id) as transaction_count FROM transaction_records GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT users.username, transaction_records.transaction_amount FROM users INNER JOIN transaction_records ON users.user_id = transaction_records.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01');
SELECT backup_id, backup_size FROM backup_history WHERE backup_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
